name: South Bird
text: On Play: Look at the top 7 cards of your deck and play up to one [Upper Yard] from among them. Then, place the rest of the cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect.text: Look at the top 7 cards of your deck and play up to one [Upper Yard] from among them. Then, place the rest of the cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

meta.notes: Card marked as 'SAMPLE' and has a 'U' and 'C' in the rarity box, indicating UC rarity. Power value is clearly printed as 2000.
